author: Special Correspondent
text:
A total of 72 bus crew were honoured with cash incentive for their exemplary service during the Republic Day celebrations at the Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation Salem region headquarters here on Tuesday.

Cash

incentives

V. Shanmugasundaram, General Manager, presented the cash incentives to them, after hoisting the National Flag.

Speaking on the occasion, the General Manager said that the drivers of the corporation have managed to achieve fuel efficiency of 5.6 km per litre for the past six months.

Similarly, the conductors too with their committed work have managed to achieve higher collection.

He commended both of them and urged them to continue their good work.

The bus crew should continue this committed work and enable the TNSTC Salem region to lead in the collection among all the regions in the state.

At the Republic Day celebrations held at the Life Insurance Corporation (LIC) of India, Salem divisional office, M. Mohana Perumal, Senior Divisional Manager, hoisted the National Flag in the presence of the officers and other staff.
title: TNSTC employees honoured
